name: Wildworld
description:
A spanking adventure game. Play as an Andrew, a young businessman, who discovers the hidden wonders of the Wildworld, a theme park inspired by the American Old West. Experience activities such as learning how to ride a horse, or hunting dangerous bandits. 

Includes:

  • slightly erotic content. It's a fetish game centered around spanking, so if that's something you're interesed in (or you would want to try out perhaps) feel free to download.
  • Bunch of mini games I experimented with during development.
  • Three endings based on your choices during the game.
  • Some bugs perhaps. I got little time for testing.

Spanking tags: M/F, F/M (a little), belt, cane, hand spanking, playful spanking, punishment spanking, judical spanking.
